summary: Campaign orchestration completed successfully. All systems have been synchronized, stakeholders notified, and the campaign is ready for launch across all specified channels and regions.

reasoning_steps.description: Validated campaign parameters and cross-referenced with system capabilities
reasoning_steps.calculations: Verified channel availability, region coverage, and SKU inventory levels
reasoning_steps.insights: All target regions and channels are operational and ready for campaign deployment

reasoning_steps.description: Coordinated stakeholder notifications and system synchronization
reasoning_steps.calculations: Calculated optimal notification timing and system sync priorities
reasoning_steps.insights: Successfully synchronized 5 systems and notified 8 stakeholders across all regions

external_sources_used.external_sources_description: Only mock data from orchestrate_campaign tool was used. No external sources were consulted.
